array.title: investin
array.one_liner: Web platform for connecting entrepreneurs and investors in the usa real estate market.
array.description: Platform for connecting entrepreneurs and investors in the usa real estate market. The platforms offers information about investments,entrepreneurs,locations and it presents articles about safe investments.

sections.title: My Role
text: Decide any technology related decision from architecture to e2e tests
Implement adobe xd files to into modular architecture, work closely with a designer
Explain any technology decision made to product manager and the entrepreneurs

sections.title: project difficulties
text: Context switching
Working with vps provider and configuring dns and domains
Heavy content
Frequent changes to data structures and content editing solution
Metrics gathering from front,back,host

sections.title: my solutions
text: I used js for the frontend and the backend to reduce the context switches
Learnt nginx and pm2 and sharpen my ubuntu skills
Async loading and server side rendering
I chose a cms that is connected to the noSQL key value database, a thing witch gave the ability to change the “schemas” of the data as we grew and by non technological people
After checking several providers (elastic-Kibana,Grafana,Honeybadger,etc..) i chose to use DataDog for its convenience and the variety of metrics in one tool.

notable_features: Own profile and activity-log, likes, messages etc..

array.title: Daniela Krol portfolio
array.one_liner: Portfolio system for the artist Daniela Krol.
array.description: Portfolio system for the artist Daniela Krol. The system contains a static generated website,backend for crud operations on the data, and an admin interface that is enforced by jwt authentication and validation.

sections.title: my role
text: Design a system that suits the following needs pixel perfect implementation of adobe xd prototype
Content is changed biweekly
Fast loading times
Access control
Build an admin interface with login mechanism
Develop and deploy all assets

sections.title: project difficulties
text: Pixel perfect implementation
Fast loading times

sections.title: my solutions
text: Built an atomic design style guide using customized tailwind configuration

Statically generated site is saving all the network calls that are blocking the sites content rendering, the content on the site is changing in a reasonable amount of time that generation times does not overflowing the build server.

notable_features: Static hosting is free on github servers, api servers run on free heroku dynos.cost is reduced to just the domain.

array.title: search component
array.one_liner: Reusable search component deployed to npm @lermanori/od-vue-components.
array.description: Reusable search component system built with the technology of vue.js, extracting the logic and representation of search through api, can be connected to every rest api and supports jwt,built with rollup deployed to npm as a package and comes with responsive example and deployed to github pages connected to the SMITHSONIAN museums api.

sections.title: my role
text: Designing the component logic
Designing the components examples
Implementation and deployment

sections.title: project difficulties
text: Making a reusable component that can fit any json and rest api
Making an extendable component

sections.title: my solutions
text: Passing props to the components 1.a base url as string 2. an adapter function that get search value and returns the end of the rest query and then we concatenate the result to the base url and make the request

Using the scoped slots feature of vue.js we can pass the result of the query to a sub component that do the actual presentation, project comes with two concrete implementations of such sub components.

array.title: marvelous wonder
array.one_liner: The project is an electronic version of a physical book made about geological effects.
array.description: The project is an electronic version of a physical book made about geological effects. It is a collaboration with the designer Rino Avidar. In this project we tried to approach a new way to enrich the usual ebook experience.

sections.title: my role
text: Implementing the artist vision in a low-cost environment
Designing a complex component that will have 4 features
Generating the entire website from a static generated json

sections.title: project difficulties
text: Collaborating with a non tech designer
Toggling between two images with animation
Speed dial fixed menu

sections.title: my solutions
text: We designed together one fully featured component and agreed on json format and naming conventions for the data and file structure, then the designer filled the json file while i implemented the rest of the site and then we combined our work with rendering the component through iterating the file
learning more about vue reactivity system (framework specific code at https://gist.github.com/lermanori/cc104dbb0f9f2892067f41a5aff95a60)

notable_features: The implementation of pixel perfect views on screens below 1900px while keeping the artist view.
The not usual approach to displaying data.
The feature component is filling the site with data while being the only component.

Creating a timer for the game that well be reusable between levels
Creating cooldown ability system

sections.title: my solutions
text: Research and three tries of storylines that didn't came through
Connecting a timer to the game logic (a singleton object) in order to make it reusable.

array.title: flappy bird-arduino version
array.one_liner: Arduino project - User interface for a classic game.
array.description: Alternative user interface for a classic game.flap your wings to fly.

sections.title: specification
text: 1 x arduino uno
1 x arduino leonardo
2 x acceleration sensors
4 x leds
1 x radio chip - receiver 1 x radio chip - emitter

sections.title: implementation
text: Arduino uno is connected to the wings with acceleration sensors, if the acceleration sensors are sensing down acceleration below certain level it uses the emitter radio chip to signal the  receiver radio chip connected to the leonardo who is connected to the operating pc and simulates pressing the spacebar hit on the computer.

notable_features: Whole the code for system was written from scratch.
The idea and the production is all self made.
The whole final product fit in a small backpack and weights below 1kg the console box is under 5 scm.
